name: Wasp Hive Defense
description:
Protect your hives with wasps! 

Interesting fact: Wasps don't have hives - they have nests! But in this game's version of reality, not only do they have hives, but they are also made out of gold!

Plus the wasps have elemental powers! Wahoo!

This game is yet another prototype along the way of learning how to make games.
